title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: And he saw his mother, the pillar of the Anglican Bridge Club, drinking endless cups of weak tea with her friend on the front veranda and saying to her, "I'm dying of boredom, you know, Lill.
